name: Celestial Moon Shot
description:
You are the guy in 3020 year who decided to launch the moon out of Solar System to explore space using it as a space ship. One problem - moon is now habitable and full of hideous monsters. Can you build engines from scratch to go space?

Open inventory with I button, and crafting menu with C button.

Credits:

Astronaut sprite - https://dizabanik.itch.io/pixelastronaut
Music - https://cactusdude.itch.io/space-soundtrack-01
